headline: First Cessna Citation Longitude Delivered Into Central America, Expanding Global Fleet of the Company’s Flagship Super-Midsize Business Jet
summary: WICHITA, Kan., May 29, 2025--Textron Aviation Inc., a Textron Inc. (NYSE:TXT) company, today announced the first delivery of its flagship Cessna Citation Longitude super-midsize business jet into Central America. The long-time Citation customer is based in Costa Rica and plans to use the aircraft for business and personal use.
